data.message: It would be great if Facebook actually had support help!!!! I cannot believe we out money I to advertising business pages and then when someone hacks them and takes them from you Facebook is no where in site to help you take back what's yours. I'm so extremely upset

replies.message: Its amazing that they can approve an advertising request so quickly but when you contact them because your business page has been hacked they send you some auto response pop up and nothing else!
They have it where you cannot post pictures here. I wanted to post all the proof of all of the times I have contacted them and have been ignored.
